text:
@realDonaldTrump @TamaraLeigh_llc 126,000 people have the Wuhan virus worldwide. The death rate is between 0.06 & 0.07. Less than 1%. 

About 3-5 million cases of severe flu illness & about 250,000 to 
500,000 flu season deaths worldwide occur due to the flu virus. 10% death rate.

It won’t be that difficult.
